title: What Is Bluesky and Could It Replace Twitter?
description: Some Twitter users are rushing to join Bluesky, a social platform funded by Jack Dorsey, a founder of Twitter.

title: Lyft Employees Told to Return to Office as New Chief Executive Lays Out Vision
description: A day after nearly 1,100 people were laid off, the struggling company told its remaining workers to prepare for a series of changes.

title: New York’s Transit Agency Quits Sharing Updates on Twitter
description: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority said it would no longer provide service information on Twitter because the “reliability of the platform can no longer be guaranteed.”

title: Deepfake Drake, HatGPT and Ben Smith on the End of the BuzzFeed Era
description: Is A.I. the future of the music industry? Musicians are split.
